content: is approximately 13 inches 36 inches total teen / adult motif is approximately 15 inches 38 inches total the purple kitty ©2025 2 happy crocheting the smaller size is referenced first with the larger size in parentheses chain 48 58 row 1 working in the bottom bumps single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and each st to the end chain 1 turn 47 57 row 2 single_crochet in 1st st *berry in the next stitch single_crochet in the next* repeat ** to end making sure the last st is a single_crochet chain 1 turn 23 berries 24 single_crochet 28berries 29sc row 3 single_crochet in 1st st and in each st to the end ch1 turn 47 57 row 4 single_crochet in 1st st *berry in the next stitch single_crochet in the next* repeat ** to end making sure the last st is a single_crochet chain 1 turn 23 berries 24 single_crochet 28berries 29sc row 5 single_crochet in 1st st and in each st to the end 47 57 do not cut yarn do not turn both sizes there are no chains for this part of the ties you should be working the right side make 5 evenly spaced single_crochet along the end you re at turn skip 1st st single_crochet in next 4 st turn skip 1st st single_crochet in next 3 st turn skip 1st st single_crochet in next 2 st turn skip 1st st single_crochet in next chain 50 working in bottom bumps slip_stitch in 2nd chain and in each chain down fasten_off weave in ends join to opposite end with a slip_stitch on the right side and follow the same pattern as the other end weave in ends with a tapestry needle congratulations your strawberry girl headband is done share the cuteness you made with me and others snap tag and share ig @thepurplekittyhooks fb the purple kitty #thepurplekittyhooks #pkhstrawberrygirl the purple kitty ©2025 3
